biotools.summary: BioBB Wfs extends and complements the BioBB library offering web-based access to a collection of predefined biomolecular simulation workflows built using the BioExcel Building Blocks library. Molecular Dynamics setup, docking, ligand parameterization, and flexibility analyses are examples of workflows included in the website.

bioschemas.name: BioExcel Building Blocks Workflows (BioBB-Wfs)
